divs: Sighting DetailsWe we're on our way home..Heading North of downtown Tulsa. My husband and I both saw at the sametime, a very large "shooting star" except that it was very very close. I thought it looked like it may have landed in our neighborhood. We couldn't see where it landed. It was very big. It was a quick moment of ...WOW, what was that?
trends: There have been 59 other sightings in Tulsa
There were no other sightings in Tulsa on or around December 16th 2009
Summary: Look like a large fireball going very fast, it looked like it would've crashed and hit land, but no way to know. It was close and big!
